page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE.....(CONT)
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICHOLAS (CONT'D) THEN WE HAVE SOME PRAYERS.AFTER THAT WE GO BACK TO OUR CLASSROOM.AFTER A WHILE DIANE AND I GO TO OUR MATHS GROUPS.WE DO 20 SUMS.THEN AT 10.35 WE HAND OUR MATHS BOOKS IN AND GO TO PLAY.AFTER PLAY WE DO DOMESDAY PROJECT OR SWIMMING.WHEN WE HAVE DONE AN HOURS WORK IT IS 12.00.THEN WE GO TO PLAY.AFTER HALF AN HOUR WE HAVE OUR DINNER.AFTER DINNER WE GO BACK OUT TO PLAY.AFTER PLAY IT DEPENDS WHAT WE DO. SOMETIMES WE DO WRITING.THEN AT PLAY TIME WE PLAY BULLDOG.THEN WE GO INSIDE NOW WE DO ENGLISH WHICH IS COMPREHENSION ,VOCABULARY,SPELLING AND READING.THEN WE TIDY OUR DESKS,PUT UP OUR CHAIRS UP AND SAY A PRAYER.THEN SIR SAYS GOODNIGHT.WE GET OUR BAGS AND I GO HOME ON THE BUS.
